en_title: HKSAR Government officials to visit Beijing
zh_title: 特區政府官員訪問北京

en: The Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, and the Secretary for Transport and Housing, Professor Anthony Cheung Bing-leung will depart for Beijing tomorrow (March 13).

During the stay in Beijing, they will meet with relevant officials of the Central People's Government to exchange views on matters relating to the Hong Kong Section of the Guangzhou-Shenzhen-Hong Kong Express Rail Link. They will return to Hong Kong on March 14.
During the absence of Professor Cheung, the Under Secretary for Transport and Housing, Mr Yau Shing-mu, will be the Acting Secretary for Transport and Housing.
zh: 律政司司長袁國強資深大律師和運輸及房屋局局長張炳良教授明日（三月十三日）啟程前往北京。
在北京期間，他們將與相關中央官員會面，就廣深港高速鐵路香港段相關事宜交換意見。他們將於三月十四日返港。
張炳良教授離港期間，運輸及房屋局副局長邱誠武將署任運輸及房屋局局長。

en: The Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, and the Secretary for Transport and Housing, Professor Anthony Cheung Bing-leung will depart for Beijing tomorrow (March 13).

During the stay in Beijing, they will meet with relevant officials of the Central People's Government to exchange views on matters relating to the Hong Kong Section of the Guangzhou-Shenzhen-Hong Kong Express Rail Link
They will return to Hong Kong on March 14.
During the absence of Professor Cheung, the Under Secretary for Transport and Housing, Mr Yau Shing-mu, will be the Acting Secretary for Transport and Housing.
zh: 律政司司長袁國強資深大律師和運輸及房屋局局長張炳良教授明日（三月十三日）啟程前往北京
在北京期間，他們將與相關中央官員會面，就廣深港高速鐵路香港段相關事宜交換意見
他們將於三月十四日返港
張炳良教授離港期間，運輸及房屋局副局長邱誠武將署任運輸及房屋局局長
